content.data:
[Y]Feature Long Read
[W]Why CPC magazines felt electric.
[c][m.]
[W]Magazine culture mixed humour, coding
[W]and reader experiments in one loud
[W]monthly ritual.
[W]Kids learned by typing, testing,
[W]failing and reading the letters page
[W]again.
[c][m.]
[G]- Type-ins taught patience.
[G]- Reviews taught critique.
[G]- Letters built community.
[m][m-]
[Y]DID YOU KNOW?
[C]Many coders started from one listing
[C]in a magazine.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
